scripts.build:analyze: ng build --stats-json && ng analytics off && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/portfolio/stats.json --no-open --report dist/bundle-report.html
scripts.stats:read: ng build --stats-json && node -e "const stats = require('./dist/portfolio/stats.json'); console.log('🌱 GREEN CODING BUNDLE ANALYSIS:'); console.log('='.repeat(40)); const chunks = stats.chunks || []; const modules = stats.modules || []; const initialChunk = chunks.find(c => c.initial || c.entry); const initialSize = initialChunk ? initialChunk.size : 0; const totalSize = chunks.reduce((sum, c) => sum + (c.size || 0), 0); console.log('Initial Bundle:', (initialSize / 1024).toFixed(2) + ' KB / 500 KB target'); console.log('Total Bundle:', (totalSize / 1024).toFixed(2) + ' KB'); console.log('Status:', initialSize <= 500000 ? '✅ Green Coding Compliant' : '❌ Needs Optimization'); if (initialSize > 500000) { console.log('Reduction needed:', ((initialSize - 500000) / 1024).toFixed(2) + ' KB'); } console.log('\nLargest Modules (>50KB):'); const largeModules = modules.filter(m => m.size > 50000).sort((a,b) => b.size - a.size).slice(0,5); if (largeModules.length === 0) { console.log('  ✅ No modules >50KB found!'); } else { largeModules.forEach(m => { const name = m.name ? m.name.split('/').pop() || m.name : 'unnamed'; console.log('  ' + (m.size / 1024).toFixed(2) + ' KB - ' + name); }); } console.log('\n🎯 Green Coding Quick Wins:'); console.log('  • Replace AOS library (-20-30KB)'); console.log('  • Standalone Components (-30-50KB)'); console.log('  • Angular 17 Control Flow (-10-15KB)'); console.log('='.repeat(40));"
